validateServerEvidenceValue_M2

public void validateServerEvidenceValue_M2(java.math.BigInteger evidenceValueFromServer_M2)
                                    throws SRPAuthenticationFailedException
When the server sends M(2), call this method to validate the number.

Parameters:
evidenceValueFromServer_M2 - M(2) from the server.
Throws:
SRPAuthenticationFailedException - if M(2) is incorrect
